DataElement.preferredName: Patient Infratentorial Neoplasm Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes no indicator related to the brain tumor locations, which are necessary to allow a patient to participate in a clinical study.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Infratentorial Neoplasm Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A benign or malignant neoplasm that occurs in brain parenchymal tissue below the tentorium cerebelli._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.
